net.objectzoo.events.impl

Class Event0Distributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.objectzoo.events.impl.Event0Distributor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action0, Event0, Event0Delegate

    public class Event0Distributor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Event0Delegate
    The Event0Distributor is a Event0Delegate implementation that allows event distribution to multiple subscribers. It is a helper class that encapsulates all the logic required to provide events in other classes. Subscriber invocations are performed in the order of subscription.
    Author:
    tilmann
